sentences.en: A witty impromptu must not sound premeditated.
sentences.cn: 一段诙谐的即兴表演不能看起来像提前准备过的.

sentences.en: Certainly the rejection of Bush's letter appeared to have been premeditated.
sentences.cn: 无疑,伊拉克拒绝接受布什的信似乎是事先就谋划好了的.

sentences.en: I always delight in overthrowing those kind of a person of premeditated contempt for me.
sentences.cn: 我一向喜欢戳穿人家的诡计,作弄一下那些存心想要蔑视我的人.

sentences.en: In a case of premeditated murder a life sentence is mandatory.
sentences.cn: 蓄意杀人依法要判无期徒刑。

sentences.en: It was a premeditated aggression against her neighbours.
sentences.cn: 这是对邻国的蓄意侵略行动.

sentences.en: It'seems that on Niuka fans, Ashley baffling to hire Wise is already premeditated.
sentences.cn: 就纽卡球迷看来,阿什利莫名其妙地聘请怀斯是早有预谋的.

sentences.en: Second Degree Murder: Any premeditated murder or felony murder that does not involve special circumstances.
sentences.cn: 二级谋杀: 任何不设计特殊情况的预谋伤害或者重罪杀害.

sentences.en: The attack was premeditated and preplanned.
sentences.cn: 这次袭击是预先策划好的。

sentences.en: The Chinese foreign ministry called the move'a premeditated, anti - Chinese farce.
sentences.cn: 中国外交部称其举动为 “ 有预谋的 反 华闹剧. ”

sentences.en: The destruction of Maldek was premeditated.
sentences.cn: 摧毁马尔戴克是有预谋的.

sentences.en: The killing had not been premeditated.

sentences.cn: 那次谋杀并不是真正预谋的.

sentences.en: We needed to know whether the crime had been premeditated.
sentences.cn: 我们需要知道的是这一犯罪行为是否经过事先策画.

trans.tran_en: a premeditated crime or attack is planned in advance and done deliberately

trans.tran_cn: 预谋，预先考虑( premeditate的过去式和过去分词 )
